wikipedia_page.main: Richard Alexander is a British actor.

response: *Richard Alexander (TV presenter) (active since 2003), British actor and TV presenter
*Richard Alexander (field hockey) (born 1981), English field hockey defender
Rubbernecker is a reality television show that is hosted by Richard Alexander, currently broadcasting  on Nuts TV, the Freeview/cable/satellite channel in the UK, operated by Turner Broadcasting.
* Richard Alexander – (born 1971) television presenter, producer & director, born in Wibsey.
